title: Council Directive 89/359/EEC of 29 May 1989 amending Directive 77/93/EEC on protective measures against the introduction into the Member States of organisms harmful to plants or plant products
header:
COUNCIL  DIRECTIVE
of 29 May 1989
amending Directive 77/93/EEC on protective measures against the introduction into the Member States of organisms harmful to plants or plant products
(89/359/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Article 7 (3) of Directive 77/93/EEC:
- 'Article 6 (3)' is replaced by 'Article 6 (2), in so far as seeds referred to in Annex IV, Part B are concerned and Article 6 (3)', and
- '31 December 1986' is replaced by '31 December 1991'.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 May 1989.
For the Council
The President
C. ROMERO HERRERA
